description: Not only does the interface keep blanking out (everythng in it disappears, flashes back, disappears over and over) but also it apparently loads only the lossy JPG and does not handle lossless TIFF format. If it does, nothing happens when I drag one into it during one of the brief moments that the drag box is showing. When I click the button in order to locate the file via the file system, nothing is readble with every character being a box rather than a letter. Other OCR engines that work with Tesseract do handle TIFFs so definately not a limitation with the engine! There are no errors either but nothing happens.
If you want people to pay say so at the begging not after I downloaded and converted the doc!!
summary: It shouldnt be labeled free if you only convert half the doc!!

description: Does not really do what it promises to do. Mostly a blank page

Downloaded this and read the instructions.
Instructions suggest that the OCR is PERFORMED ONLINE!
Selected a simple image of clear, 12 point text and then disconnected my internet.
Tried all the options but predictably nothing worked.
Reconnected the internet and tried again.
This time things happened and the "swirly-something is happening" wheel thing ran for about 10 seconds
Was then given the option to Copy to Clipboard or to Save.
Tried to Copy to a blank Text page - Nothing.
Selected Save - "Example 1" was saved as a document file. Opened it - BLANK!

No doubt this worked on the author's machine but with so many flavours of Ubuntu this doesn't work for some others who have tried it, including me.

However. I will NOT allow any of MY images or text to be uploaded to some anonymous computer. 
Who knows what happens to them? Do they remain for examination for any useful text, information?
I have no idea and I'm not going to bother to find out.
ANY application that 'phones home' is a potential security risk. An application that uploads my files is a BIG security risk.
Uninstalled and moving on!

Thisbeme
summary: Hopeless! - AND requires an internet connection

description: Blank page without any functioning feature

Simple to use. Result very accurate conversion to text. Had to respace although line breaks mostly correct. (I was converting poems written in shortish lines.) I was not asked to pay anything. Perhaps because poems were all quite short. No problem needing internet connection. Unless something has gone wrong I am always online when using my computer.
summary: Very accurate conversion of jpg to text

description: Must have! If your ChatGPT helper reads text only.
It does not extract text from a PDF

pdf to text made it all one long sentence, and I mean pdftotextmadeitintoonelongsentence! 

pdf to word put it in many sections, like the bible, but several more.

summary: Says minimum 6 MB supported. Does not work

description: Lädt das PDF zu einem ienst hoch, Ergebnis ist eine Zumutung!

Von solch einem Programm erwarte ich das PDF erkannt und gewandelt werden...
Da ich nicht möchte das zu wandelnde Dokument irgendwohin kopiert werden, bspw ins Internet habe ich dem Program den Zugriff auf die onlineverbindungen über Permissions verwehrt. Resultat, es erkennt nichtmal die PDFs auf meinem System. Von Wandeln gar keine Rede.. auf Deutsch gesagt, das Programm ist "Scheibenkleister".

La instalé y funciona a la perfección. Es veloz, práctico e intuitivo y tiene las opciones que se necesitan para tomar por OCR el texto de una imagen jpg y guardarlo como word o texto o copiarlo al portapapeles. Mínimo de errores y estable. Gracias. Excelente trabajo.

Je cherchais une application simple pour convertir des PDF en TXT. 
Image To Text rempli parfaitement ce rôle. C'est une excellente application, je la recommande. Merci Monsieur Ahmad Sattar.

L'application a fonctionné immédiatement et sans erreur.
 Interface simple et facile à prendre en main.
 Que demande le peuple ?
